io.sarl.sre.skills.bic

Skill InnerContextAccessSkill

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.sarl.lang.core.SRESpecificDataContainer
      • io.sarl.lang.core.AgentProtectedAPIObject
        • io.sarl.lang.core.AgentTrait
          • io.sarl.lang.core.Skill
            • io.sarl.sre.skills.bic.InnerContextAccessSkill
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InnerContextAccess, Capacity

    public class InnerContextAccessSkill
extends Skill
implements InnerContextAccess
    SRE implementation of SARL's InnerContextAccess built-in capacity.

    The inner context instance is stored into the AgentLife.

    Version:
    0.12.0-SNAPSHOT 2020-06-30 17:45:08
    Author:
    Sebastian Rodriguez, Nicolas Gaud, Stéphane Galland
    Maven Group Id:
    io.janusproject
    Maven Artifact Id:
    io.janusproject.plugin

      • getMemberAgentCount

        @Pure
public def getMemberAgentCount() : int 
        Description copied from interface: InnerContextAccess
        Replies the number of agents that are members of the inner context of the calling agent. A member agent is an agent which is not the calling agent, and is a member of at least one space of the inner context.

        The replied number includes the current agent. Indeed, the current agent is member of its internal context with the role of super-holon.

        Specified by:
        getMemberAgentCount in interface InnerContextAccess
        Returns:
        the number of members in the internal context of the current agent.

      • getMemberAgents

        @Pure
public def getMemberAgents() : ConcurrentSkipListSet<UUID> 
        Description copied from interface: InnerContextAccess
        Replies all the member agents in the inner context. A member agent is an agent which is not the calling agent, and is a member of at least one space of the inner context.
        Specified by:
        getMemberAgents in interface InnerContextAccess
        Returns:
        the identifiers of the members of the internal context of the current agent.

      • hasMemberAgent

        @Pure
public def hasMemberAgent() : boolean 
        Description copied from interface: InnerContextAccess
        Replies if the calling agent has other agents as members of its inner context. A member agent is an agent which is not the calling agent, and is a member of at least one space of the inner context.
        Specified by:
        hasMemberAgent in interface InnerContextAccess
        Returns:
        true if the current agent has other agents as member of its internal context; otherwise false
